faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.donation_direction: Can I direct my donation to a particular area or project?
faq.donation_direction_answer: To designate your donation to a specific area or project, send us a note with your donation by mail. We'll allocate it accordingly and send you an acknowledgment.
faq.volunteer: How do I volunteer with The Amal Charity?
faq.volunteer_answer: We offer various volunteering opportunities throughout the year. Please visit our volunteer page or contact us directly to learn about current opportunities.
faq.workplace_giving: How can I learn more about giving through my workplace?
faq.workplace_giving_answer: Many employers offer matching gift programs. Contact your HR department or reach out to us for more information about workplace giving options.
